definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

pinyin: Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Fa3 zhi4 ju2

definition: Legal Daily, newspaper published by PRC Ministry of Justice

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遺傳的宗法制度毋寧是儒家文化的深厚社會基礎。

sentences.english: The factors were studied which affected the preparation of PFS in this method.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯酸鈉氧化法制備PFS的影響因素。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 採用懸浮交聯法制備沙棘混合粉的微膠囊。

sentences.english: BCN thin films were grown by RF reactive sputtering.
sentences.chinese: 用射頻反應濺射法制備出BCN薄膜。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: Tody an increasing number of people have realized that law education is of great importance .In order to keep law and order, very one of us is supposed to get(=receive)a law education.
sentences.chinese: 現在越來越多的人認識到法制教育的重要性。

sentences.english: By the revolutionary impact of white deer before the case was originally a typical legal society.
sentences.chinese: 受到革命衝擊之前的白鹿原是典型的宗法制社會。

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制備丙烯酸酯合成樹脂。

sentences.english: Meso - carbon microbeads (MCMBs) were prepared from coal tar pitch by condensation.
sentences.chinese: 以煤瀝青爲原料，採用熱縮聚法制備中間相炭微球。

sentences.english: IV. Improving the mechanisms for organizing, leading and guaranteeing legal publicity and education.
sentences.chinese: 完善法制宣傳教育的組織領導和保障機制。

sentences.english: The plea agreement originated from a criminal jurisdiction system of US.
sentences.chinese: 辯訴交易是產生於美國的一項刑事司法制度。

sentences.english: The rule reflects how well the democracy goes in a country.
sentences.chinese: 無罪推定體現了一個國家法制民主文明化的程度。

sentences.english: In the seventh part, the white paper stresses the importance of the "Popularization and Education of the Law."
sentences.chinese: 白皮書第七章強調了法律普及和法制教育的重要性。

sentences.english: Cutting back overstaffed organizations and strengthening the legal system are both components of the reform.
sentences.chinese: 消除機構臃腫，加強法制，這些都是改革。

sentences.english: Mechanism of carbon reducing reaction in preparing strontium carbonate by carbon reducing method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳還原法制備碳酸鍶過程中碳還原反應的機理。

sentences.english: Several hydrolases to chitosan and methods were described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 就酶法制備低分子量殼聚糖的方法進行了綜述性報道。

definition: rule of law/to rule by law
rule by virtue/rule by setting virtuous example (Confucian ideal)
to rule according to the law
